Whither the Global Directory?

  • Shouldn't DS help solve the DNS problem?

    It won't free us from DNS;
    but will provide richer info space for DNS-named domains

  • Schema standardization

    Schema to support user/account/service are vendor-specific
      it's hard to get the OS out ...
    Hard to represent complex data structures (eg CIM policy)
    Will XML solve this problem?

  • Directory confederations?

    via centroid indexing, perhaps
    but what's the motivator? PKI?
